ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Timeout Errors
- The agent is running into timeout errors. This can be mitigated by simplifying the code and logic, or by increasing the allowed execution time.

### Errors when using get_entities
- The agent is running into errors when using get_entities. This can be mitigated by ensuring that the agent is connected to the game and that the game is running.
